title: Mayday Parade: Discography
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The FLAC Discography Collection:

All Time Low (thepiratebay.se/torrent/4633727)
Mayday Parade (thepiratebay.se/torrent/4635793)
American Diary (thepiratebay.se/torrent/4732438)

On my todo list: Flight 409, Fall Out Boy

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As Mayday Parade's full discography is currently available for sale wherever albums are sold, this was not a very difficult torrent to compile, as opposed to All Time Low's. However, it is important, nonetheless, that all can appreciate this band's complete works, as well. Mayday Parade is a fantastic band, with an even more fantastic secondary vocalist, Mr. Jeremy Lenzo. The only reason Jeremy isn't the lead singer of Mayday Parade is because if he was singing all throughout every song, your head would explode from the shouting goodness. Honestly, though, they're wonderful on tour, and I recommend you go see them when they get back on, after they finish their contribution to Punk Goes Pop, Vol. 2 with a cover of The Pussycat Dolls' "When I Grow Up". Hilarious, I know. Seed away, folks.
